title: ZX 22 BOOST Shoes
subtitle: Men's Originals
description:
Rooted in innovation, these adidas shoes rethink the progressive adidas ZX series, bringing in a degree of simplicity to the line's storied legacy. Suede overlays, reflective accents and molded TPU hardware details stand out on the sleek ripstop upper. The JET BOOST midsole brings energized comfort and stability to your every move.

Made in part with recycled content generated from production waste, e.g. cutting scraps, and post-consumer household waste to avoid the larger environmental impact of producing virgin content.
details: Lace closure; Ripstop upper with suede overlays; EVA midsole with JET BOOST drop-in; Textile lining; Rubber outsole; 25% of the components used to make the upper are made with a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Core Black / Carbon / Solar Red; Product code: GX7007
colors: Core Black / Core Black / Semi Impact Orange

title: Adilette Comfort Adjustable Slides
subtitle: Men's Yoga
description: You know that feeling. When you slip off your shoes after a long workout and feel that sweet relief. Keep it going in these lightweight adidas Adilette slides. Soft cushioning rewards hard-working feet.

colors: Core Black / Cloud White / Grey Six

title: Stan Smith Shoes
subtitle: Men's Originals
description: The adidas Stan Smith shoes are pretty unmistakable at this point. Clean. Minimalist. Versatile. It's their calling card, one that's continued to make an impact all over the cultural landscape. There's absolutely no disputing what these sneakers are, especially since STAN SMITH flashes in gold from the side, the tongue label has the namesake's face quite boldly there and gold jewels dangle from the laces — STAN on one shoe, SMITH on the other.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; Synthetic leather upper; Hugs the foot; Synthetic leather lining; Rubber outsole; Upper contains a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Cloud White / Collegiate Orange / Green; Product code: GW0488
colors: Pantone / Cloud White / Core Black

Strike when your opponent least expects it. Drive to the rim, pull up from deep and leave defenders in your wake — just like James Harden. These juniors' adidas basketball shoes are made with BOOST for the energy return you need from the opening whistle to those grueling last seconds of overtime. Bands on the forefoot and heel give you a locked-down feel all game long.

Made in part with recycled content generated from production waste, e.g. cutting scraps, and post-consumer household waste to avoid the larger environmental impact of producing virgin content.

description: When you step onto the pitch, don't just play the game. Feel it. Get closer to the ball in these adidas Copa Sense firm ground cleats. Seamlessly blended by Fusionskin technology, their laceless adidas PRIMEKNIT collar and K-leather forefoot ensure velvety-smooth play. Sensepods in the heel and Touchpods on the sides optimize lockdown and your feel for the ball. The eye-catching graphics take inspiration from soccer's biggest stage.

description: With the help of 1.2 million foot scans, we updated Ultraboost with a complete 360° female fit improvement. And we didn't stop there. We re-engineered the rubber outsole. We tested hundreds of prototypes. We kept going until we saw visible improvements in performance. The result? 4% more forefoot energy return, compared to Ultraboost 21 for women. The adidas PRIMEKNIT upper includes a narrower heel fit, designed to avoid heel slip and blisters. You'll be riding on a BOOST midsole with a Linear Energy Push system. The shoe's upper is made with yarn containing 50% Parley Ocean Plastic —  reimagined plastic waste, intercepted on remote islands, beaches, coastal communities and shorelines, preventing it from polluting our ocean.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; adidas PRIMEKNIT textile upper; Soft heel fit; Linear Energy Push system; BOOST midsole; Weight: 289 g (size UK 5.5); Stretchweb outsole with Continental™ Better Rubber; Yarn in upper contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic  and 50% recycled polyester; Imported; Product color: Core Black / Cloud White / Solar Yellow; Product code: GX6658

description: The distance running shoe inspired by the idea of perpetual motion and tested over 4,500 km. Adistar combines a soft, lightweight REPETITOR foam platform with REPETITOR +, a firmer foam, to create a dual density midsole. The firmer 15% recycled EVA in the heel protects and helps stabilize any heel strike. Forward propulsion is enhanced by the rocker geometry as well as an overall 6mm drop heel to toe. Strike soft and push forward with a shoe designed to go the distance.

description: Y-3 promotes a strong adidas identity with the Shiku Run shoes. Between the layered mesh and woven upper, thick monochrome 3-Stripes create an X-ray effect that is subtly seen and felt. Enhanced cushioning is lightweight. A detailed cord system finishes the look.

description: These juniors' adidas Swift Run X Shoes turn everyday steps into all-day explorations. From the park to the playground to the trails behind the school. The neighborhood is all yours. The airy upper and lightweight cushioning make every step comfortable.

description:
"Y-3 is a strong examination of the blend of sport and style and the tension caused by mixing tradition with all that is modern."  — Yohji Yamamoto 

Y-3 introduces the Ajatu Run, a timeless silhouette built on a quintessential running aesthetic. The vintage-look upper is crafted from a material mix of premium suede, layered woven textile and breathable mesh, all finished with rubber detailing. State-of-the-art adidas Lightstrike technology introduces a new level of comfort with an incredibly lightweight midsole.
details: Lace closure; Suede, double-layer textile and mesh upper; Collapsible feel; Suede and mesh lining; Lightstrike cushioning; Rubber outsole; Imported; Product color: Core White / Cream White / Black; Product code: HR1936
